Drinks.desc: Vodka, ginger beer, and a splash of fresh lime juice.
Gin, cherry liquer, creme de violette, simple syrup, and lemon juice.

Appetizers.desc: Brussel Sprouts roasted with parmesan cheese and a raspberry balsamic glaze.
Chef's selection of meats, cheeses, and accompaniments.

Salads.desc: Basil, fresh locally-grown tomatoes, and Bufalo mozzarella drizzled with olive oil and balsamic.
Chicken, salad, whatever else goes in an asian chicken salad.

Entrees.desc: 12oz NY Strip Streak with truffle butter. Served with fries and homemade ketchup.
8oz of freshly caught Atlantic Salmon, served with asparagus.

Desserts.desc: Traditional creme brulee. If it ain't broke, don't fix it.
Soft chocolate cake filled with warm dark chocolate ganache.
